scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix shared
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix shared
scripts.setup:links: cd shared && npm run build && npm link && cd ../server && npm link shared && cd ../client && npm link shared
scripts.dev: npm run setup:links && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
